persona: I am a fantasy book enthusiast who loves epic storylines
chosen_topic_passage: Game of Thrones is an American fantasy drama television series created by David Benioff and D. B. Weiss for HBO.
It is an adaptation of A Song of Ice and Fire, a series of fantasy novels by George R. R. Martin.
The series premiered on HBO on April 17, 2011, and concluded on May 19, 2019, with 73 episodes broadcast over eight seasons.
Set on the fictional continents of Westeros and Essos, Game of Thrones has a large ensemble cast and follows several story arcs throughout the course of the show.
